XboxController:
0=a
1=b
2=x
3=y
4=lb
5=rb
6=lt
7=rt
8=back
9=start
10=clickstickleft
11=clickstickright
12=top
13=bottom
14=left
15=right

Axis0=leftstickup/down
Axis1=leftstickleft/right
Axis2=rightstickup/down
Axis3=rightstickleft/right

PS4Controller:
0=X
1=CIRCLE
2=SQUARE
3=TRIANGLE
4=L1
5=R1
6=L2
7=R2
8=SHARE
9=OPTIONS
10=CLICKLEFTSTICK
11=CLICKRIGHTSTICK
12=ARROWUP
13=ARROWDOWN
14=ARROWLEFT
15=ARROWRIGHT
16=PSBUTTON
17=CLICKTOUCH

Axis0=leftstickup/down
Axis1=leftstickleft/right
Axis2=rightstickup/down
Axis3=rightstickleft/right
